unnormalised: For road trips near Pune, consider Lonavala (approx. 65 km) or Mahabaleshwar (120 km), but be aware that tolls on the expressway could be around Rs. 285 each way. Always check live traffic updates on Google Maps for the fastest route.
normalised: For road trips near Pune, consider Lonavala approximately sixty five kilometer or Mahabaleshwar one hundred and twenty kilometer, but be aware that tolls on the expressway could be around rupee two hundred and eighty five each way. Always check live traffic updates on Google Maps for the fastest route.
